  index: "my_locations",
  query: {
    bool: {
      must: {
        match_all: {},
      },
      filter: {
        geo_bounding_box: {
          "pin.location": {
            top_left: {
              lat: 40.73,
              lon: -74.1,
            },
            bottom_right: {
              lat: 40.01,
              lon: -71.12,
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
